Class Controller

    ComputerController, HumanController

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isHuman()
      Allows you to check if the player object is being run by a computer or by a human.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Player player,
                   Ball ball,
                   double dt)
        Update the position of the given player's racket.
        Parameters:
        player: - Player object to update.
        ball: - Ball object to track.
        dt: - Milliseconds passes since the previous frame.

      • isHuman

        public boolean isHuman()
        Allows you to check if the player object is being run by a computer or by a human.
        Returns:
        True if human controlled, false if computer controlled.
